title: ‘No Point Worrying About Pogačar’: Visma and Vingegaard Bullish on Tour de France Comeback Plan
content:
Trainer backs controversial altitude-heavy, race-lite approach as Vingegaard scrambles back from concussion: 'We know this works.'

Read the full article at ‘No Point Worrying About Pogačar’: Visma and Vingegaard Bullish on Tour de France Comeback Plan on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
